data.name: Netspectre
data.detailed_description:
Netspectre invites you into a role of a freelancing network hacker in a merciless, futuristic cyberpunk universe. Do you have what it takes to be a netspectre?



The principal mechanic of the game is hacking into networks. The security will try to shut you out, so be smarter than that! Learn to adapt your strategy based on both the hardware and modules in your deck – and also to each particular situation, as all the networks are uniquely procedurally-generated, all the way from their layout down to particular barriers, terminals, sentries, protocols, traces, and all the other elements.



Inbetween the networks runs, the game slows back down into its narrative layer, where stories of the city invite you to immerse yourself deeper into the world around you. Acquire new contracts, shop for better components for your deck, make some money on the side, buy a miniature pink mutant spider, or just have a drink on the rooftop and watch the skyline with the other desperate misfits, figuring out your next move.



With a single playthrough taking just between thirty minutes and an hour, everything is designed for high replayability. You're offered different contracts to take, components to purchase, and special narrative choices to make each time that you play. You can setup each playline in terms of both its length and difficulty, so that you can tailor your experience to what you feel like playing right this time.


Right now, Netspectre is in development and being playtested by a first round of volunteers. Wishlist it here, follow it on the social media, and join the Discord to stay in touch!

data.short_description: Netspectre is a hacker roguelike set in a ruthless, cyberpunk universe. Infiltrate networks, improve your machine, navigate the challenges of daily life as a netspectre in a futuristic megacity, and perhaps even become one of its many legends!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains references to mild violence, substance abuse, and other mature topics.
